feed.title: Voltaserve Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ui): show circle around active profile image when active by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/160
  • fix: 3D thumbnail generation by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/164
  • feat(conversion): lazy download for dependencies by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/165
  • chore: issue templates by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/161
  • ci(language): integrate Python linters by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/178
  • feat: lazy download for languages, and support more by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/169
  • fix: don't error on unknown files by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/180
  • fix(api): search pagination, format SQL queries by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/185
  • perf: improve performance of IsGrandChildOf by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/188
  • feat(migration): create user table by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/191
  • feat(migration): create organization table and join table for membership by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/194
  • feat(migration): create workspace table by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/195
  • ci: fix migration dockerfile path by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/201
  • chore: make migrations dockerfile multi-arch aware by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/202
  • fix(migrations): CockroachDB compatibility & separate permission tables by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/204
  • chore: switch back to Node.js because Bun is unstable by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/206
  • fix(ui): account notification glitch by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/208
  • fix: permission system blockers by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/207
  • docs: add linter instructions to README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/213
  • perf: fast copy by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/209
  • perf: fast move by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/210
  • perf: fast delete by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/211
  • refactor: clients, preparing the ground for deduplication by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/212
  • fix: mitigate issues after merging PRs by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/214
  • refactor(api): use std's slices.Include() by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/215
  • ci: add TypeScript compiler step to UI and IdP by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/218
  • fix: when deleting a workspace, the associated S3 bucket is not deleted by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/219
  • feat(conversion): support Apple documents by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/221
  • chore: add migrations to Docker Compose file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/222
  • fix(webdav): compatibiilty with Joplin by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/223
  • docs: add Rust to DEVELOPMENT.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/224
  • feat: password hint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/225
  • feat: less docker layers by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/205
  • chore: changed date in placeholder by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/232
  • feat: build check by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/233
  • docs: update DEVELOPMENT.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/234
  • fix(ci): migrations path by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/236
  • feat(ui): support keyboard shortcuts by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/230
  • chore: run go mod tidy by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/231
  • fix(ui): rename single item when using keyboard shortcut by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/237
  • fix(migration): make compatible with initial sql file by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/228
  • fix(ui): change rename key on macOS not to interfere by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/238
  • reafactor: Combine most of duplicated code and unify conditional rendering by @Mrkazik99 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/235
  • chore(ui): integrate Prettier with ESLint, to get formatting errors in the CI by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/239
  • ci(migrations): use migrations with an s as image name by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/240
  • fix(api): make workspace root id nullable by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/241
  • fix(migration): make compatible with initial sql file by ignoring duplicate tables by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/242
  • fix(migration): ignore duplicate indices by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/243
  • fix(migrations): add proper on delete actions by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/244
  • fix(ui): revert changes by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/245

New Contributors

  • @Mrkazik99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v2.0.2...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(api): add missing authorization on thumbnail download endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/248
  • fix(api): param OpenAPI docs by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/249
  • fix(conversion): mosaic S3 key by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/253
  • refactor(api): stylecheck suggestions by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/255
  • feat: PDF segmentation - viewer uses 4x less memory on mobile by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/254
  • chore: enrich S3Object with more metadata + dynamic params by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/258
  • chore: improve S3Object data structure - part 2 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/259
  • Perform an apt-get update before installing packages by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/260
  • feat: reprocess endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/262
  • feat(api): check task status on reprocess by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/263
  • fix(api): support mosaic without preview by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/264
  • feat: use bild by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/268
  • fix: hybrid integration of bild & ImageMagick by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/269
  • fix(webdav): make MKCOL function as mkdir -p by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/271
  • refactor(ui): add missing permission functions by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/261
  • feat(conversion): automatically trigger mosaic by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/276
  • chore: switch to PostgreSQL by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/277
  • chore: ignore .DS_Store file for MacOS by @hoangna1204 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/279
  • feat: add "main" tag to image by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/270
  • fix(api): use bigint as size by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/281
  • chore: use PostgreSQL for .env files by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/280
  • fix(webdav): handle api error and use url.Values encoding by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/283
  • fix(idp): send 204 on empty response by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/284
  • fix(conversion): video thumbnail by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/286
  • fix(api): file should be deleted from cache by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/287
  • fix(api): bugs discovered with tests by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/288
  • fix(api): none permission instead of empty string by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/289
  • chore(deps): bump fast-xml-parser from 4.4.0 to 4.4.1 in /idp by @dependabot in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/282
  • fix: various issues by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/290
  • feat(api): return invitations on create by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/291
  • feat(conversion): mosaic WebP support by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/293
  • feat(api): return task on async endpoints by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/292
  • fix(api): group repo query & improve other count queries by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/294
  • refactor: UI adjustments and refactoring by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/297
  • Initial version of Cloud Console API by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/296
  • Alter pipelines to matrix strategy by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/299
  • Initial version of Cloud Console and IDP modified for Cloud Console by @Mrkazik99 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/298
  • feat: cloud console api adjustment by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/302
  • fix(migrations): for new idp fields IsAdmin and IsActive by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/303
  • fix(migrations): enable user migration by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/304
  • fix: env path for settings by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/305
  • feat: better issue templates by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/301
  • feat: added README.md by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/306
  • fix: missing SECURITY_JWT_SIGNING_KEY by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/309
  • fix: added W503 line break before binary operator ignore by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/308
  • chore(console): add .gitignore by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/311
  • chore: black formatting by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/307
  • ci(workflow): pr title check workflow by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/312
  • chore(console): improve README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/310
  • ci(workflow): excluded files irrevelant to build by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/313
  • fix(ui): Fix inconsistency in UI and improve UX by @Mrkazik99 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/314
  • fix(api): avoid division by zero in list size by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/315
  • fix(idp): wrong token expiry by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/317
  • chore(ui): fix semver version by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/318
  • chore: IDEA run by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/321
  • refactor(ui): naming consistency by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/325
  • fix(api): postgres too many clients error by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/326
  • feat(migrations): Add field in user to handle force change password by @Mrkazik99 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/323
  • ci(workflow): added misc to pr-title-checker by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/330
  • ci(workflow): minor improvements to pipelines by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/331
  • feat(conversion): 3D rendering with Blender by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/327
  • chore(misc): CockroachDB on Docker Compose by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/328
  • chore(misc): remove PDF segmentation by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/332
  • docs(misc): add golangci-lint run --fix to README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/333
  • chore(misc): switch to Bun by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/334
  • feat(console): add cache delete on patch by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/337
  • fix(misc): delete many files by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/338
  • fix(api): swag comments by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/339
  • fix(ui): add missing user avatars by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/340
  • fix(ui): disable hotkeys on modals by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/342
  • fix(idp): add invalid_credentials error + fix typos by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/344
  • fix(conversion): SIGSEGV on small images by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/345
  • refactor(api): map function + reliability on racing conditions by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/346
  • fix(ui): no dangerouslySetInnerHTML for task item component by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/347
  • fix(ui): truncate long text by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/348
  • chore(misc): update license 2.1 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/350
  • feat(misc): snapshots improvements by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/351
  • refactor(ui): mosaic and insights buttons by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/352
  • fix(ui): add missing modals to key filter by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/353
  • fix(ui): cloud console typo by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/354
  • feat(api): probe endpoints and refactoring by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/356
  • fix(misc): user picture endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/359
  • fix(misc): various issues by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/361
  • chore(misc): introduce version 3.0.0 and API v3 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/362
  • fix(language): lower memory usage, keep only xx_ent_wiki_sm by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/363
  • feat(ui): file info modal by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/364
  • refactor(language): better structure by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/365
  • fix(ui): buttons not disabled when snapshot is activated by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/366
  • refactor(misc): code quality checks with Qodana by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/367
  • refactor(ui): various code improvements by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/368
  • chore(ui): use @koupr/ui by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/369
  • fix(misc): several inconsistencies by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/370
  • fix(misc): incomplete console functionality by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/371
  • ci(console): add Flake8 and Black to GitHub actions by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/372
  • fix(misc): consistent error reporting in IdP and API by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/373
  • fix(ui): error handling in UI by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/374
  • fix(ui): pagination conditions by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/375
  • fix(ui): revert app-bar-search 3 characters limitation on key down by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/376
  • fix(ui): color scheme of create buttons in section placeholder by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/377
  • fix(misc): remove broken console features by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/378
  • feat(misc): grant/revoke user permission in Console by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/379
  • refactor(misc): remove invitations and snapshots in Console by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/382
  • refactor(language): spaCy models from Hugging Face by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/383
  • chore(misc): refine license header and file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/384
  • chore(misc): remove VS Code workspace file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/385
  • fix(ui): add missing logo props by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/387
  • fix(language): remove entity new line by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/389
  • fix(ui): improve insights chart by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/390
  • refactor(ui): improve Mosaic canvas drawing by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/391
  • fix(ui): remove viewer title header by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/392
  • feat(ui): improve file info by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/393
  • feat(ui): improve insights chart by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/394
  • refactor(api): file list endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/395
  • fix(idp): more concise error message by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/396
  • fix(ui): handle missing update time on user by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/397
  • fix(api): permission checks by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/399
  • fix(ui): permission checks by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/400
  • fix(ui): improve phrasing on file delete by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/401
  • fix(api): remove unused query param from docs by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/402
  • fix(api): file search bug by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/403
  • fix(ui): improve phrasing on file copy and move by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/404
  • fix(api): improve search by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/405
  • feat(ui): file browse search by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/406
  • refactor(ui): file browse by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/407
  • feat(api): exclude_me param in user list endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/409
  • refactor(ui): file sharing by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/408
  • chore(ui): use @koupr/ui v1.13.0 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/411
  • chore(ui): use relative date component from @koupr/ui by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/412
  • fix(ui): close modal on navigate() by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/413
  • fix(ui): close all modals on route change by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/414
  • refactor(ui): use server error messages, consistent variable names by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/415
  • chore(ui): remove unused component by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/418
  • refactor(ui): lines uglified by Prettier by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/417
  • fix(misc): README.md typo by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/419
  • chore(misc): update README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/420
  • chore(misc): switch to PostgreSQL by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/421
  • chore(misc): update README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/422
  • fix(ui): sort tasks by descending date created by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/423
  • feat(idp): brute force protection by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/424
  • fix(ui): identify .ogg and .mp4 as audio files by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/427
  • refactor(idp): migrate to Deno by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/429
  • refactor(ui): use @vitejs/plugin-react-swc by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/430
  • refactor(idp): migrate to Hono by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/431
  • fix(idp): user list by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/435
  • feat(ui): password hints everywhere by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/436
  • refactor(misc): better naming by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/437
  • refactor(console): format code by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/438
  • fix(console): organization user query by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/439
  • refactor(ui): concise phrasing on dialogs, cleanup by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/440
  • fix(ui): fine-tuning, upload menu as placeholder by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/445
  • chore(ui): use @koupr/ui@1.14.1 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/446
  • fix(ui): correct heading font family in variables.cjs by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/447
  • chore(ui): use @koupr/ui@1.14.2 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/448
  • chore(misc): format Python code by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/452
  • fix(console): SQL queries, import issues by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/453
  • chore(ui): use @koupr/ui@1.14.3 by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/454

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(shared): byte to megabyte helper by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/581
  • fix(api): simplify email templates by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/582

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1
